replies.message: Hello, there i am updating my facebook fans app in this app you will get 500k real fans. stay tuned, LIKE our page and you will be first people that would get all of fans. The old app is not working, so like this page and when we be close to 500k fans i will release new app. and all of you will get ~500k fans also to boost your page popularity. So don't be shy LIKE and SHARE this page and in a couple of weeks you would be able to be really popular https://www.facebook.com/pages/Get-real-500k-fcbk-fans/430191270399301
Please like my new page - a collection of anonymous stories at https://www.facebook.com/pages/Your-Secrets/652445834776689

¿Sabías que…?

Consumir 2 o 3 manzanas al día, desintoxica el organismo y disminuye el deseo de ingerir alcohol.
